answers.answer: I had this. I had to get rid of all my shoes and only wear leather ones. May have a reaction to plastic.
yes its those plastic garden shoes will do it for me especially the colored ones .do you wear them around the house or garden?

No I have never worn plastic shoes, so that's not it.  I have been putting ice packs on my feet at night and that helps.  I went to the Dr., but she has no idea.  I will just continue trying things, until I find something that works, and hopefully it will go away as soon as it came.

I have it too and just trying to find a remedy??? I do not believe it is tire leg syndrome .....I always feel like the only relief is cold water/ ice and there is also aching feelings as well as burning/itchy.I started Iron which did help a bit...but heard magnesium works too...Did you find any relief to date ?

question: I am experiencing itchy, burning feet only at night on the outside of my feet. My skin is not dry, or cracked nor do I have diabetes.  This started a couple of months ago.  The only thing that helps is to get up, cool my feet and move around a little.I have tried anti-itch creams and first aid spray.  Old home remedy, soaked my feet in Apple Cider vinegar.  No help at all.
title: Itchy, burning feet only at night
